ud1.5:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ud1.5:1.3: Now at that time a number of senior monks approached the Buddha—Venerables Sāriputta, Mahāmoggallāna, Mahākassapa, Mahākaccāna, Mahākoṭṭhika, Mahākappina, Mahācunda, Anuruddha, Revata, and Nanda.
ud1.5:2.1: The Buddha saw them coming off in the distance,
